snippet: John Mellencamp and Stephen King have teamed up to write a musical ghost story, “The Ghost Brothers of Darkland County,” which starts previews in Atlanta on Wednesday.
abstract: John Mellencamp and Stephen King musical ghost story, The Ghost Brothers of Darkland County, is inspired by a cabin Mellencamp purchased in his home state of Indiana, which was the scene of a deadly love triangle; musical is set to begin previews, after twelve years in the making.
lead_paragraph: John Mellencamp and Stephen King have teamed up to write a musical ghost story, “The Ghost Brothers of Darkland County,” which starts previews in Atlanta on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Stephen King and John Mellencamp’s ‘Ghost Brothers’ Musical
headline.main: Haunted by Ghost Tale? Call an Expert
headline.print_headline: Haunted by Ghost Tale? Call an Expert
